page.title: 02LANDSCAPE 2
page.content: GENERAL SURVEY. {60 00 S.E.}Wooded scarp;{rest}arable crossed by A458. Inn at{N.W.}corner {60 01}Land arable. Sheinton brook runs S.W-N.E. Ford at hamlet of Wigwig. {60 02}Grassland interspered with plantations. No public roads. {61 00 N.W.}Wooded scarp.{Rest}arable & scattered woods(pheasants){S.W.}A458. {61 01 S.E.}Wooded scarp.{Centre:-} spring line village of Homer.Mixed ag: {61 02}Woodland-deciduous.Some dairying undulating. Poor drainage. {62 00 S.W;}N.Part Wenlock.{S;}Priory ruins;Abbey.{Centre}coach garage, recreation ground,{N.}school,hospital, sewage,quarries,{S.W-N.E}Old railway. {62 01}scarp, dairying,old quarries {62 02 E.}scarp woods;rest dairying {63 00}Dairy farm,undulating {63 01}Dairy Fm,{N.W.}chemical storage. {63 02}Scarp dissected N-S;mixed woods.
